div.p: NARRATOR: As long as we're following the 0-1-2-3 guidelines, we're in the Green Phase. The hallmark of the Green Phase is low-risk choices.
NARRATOR: High-risk choices are the hallmark of the Yellow Phase, and they continue to be a foundation for each of the remaining phases.
NARRATOR: In the Orange Phase, high-risk choices are joined by psychological dependence. This hallmark of the Orange Phase causes alcohol and drugs to take on a central role in our lives.
NARRATOR: And in the Red Phase we add addiction. This hallmark means we lose the ability to consistently make low-risk choicesâ€”even if we want to.
